Psalms__55.4__The height of the day: : That is, even at noonday, when the sun is the highest, I am still in danger.
Psalms__55.5__My words: : The words or promises God has made in my favour.
Psalms__55.8__For nothing shalt thou save them: : That is, since they lie in wait to ruin my soul, thou shalt for no consideration favour or assist them, but execute thy justice upon them.
